Uses of Package
weka.clusterers

  • Classes in weka.clusterers used by weka.clusterers 
    Class and Description
    AbstractAntGridClusterer 
    AntGridClusterer.Cluster
    This is the cluster that can be assigned to the AntGridClusterer.InstancePlaceholder objects.
    AntGridClusterer.Coordinate
    Coordinate in an imaginary two-dimensional coordinate system.
    AntGridClusterer.InstancePlaceholder
    Placeholder for a Instance object that can be managed on the grid.
    DBACluster.AntHill
    The AntHill contains all the ants.
    DBACluster.AntHill.Ant
    Ants (agents) that perform the clustering task.
    DBACluster.AntHill.Cluster
    This is the cluster that can be assigned to the instances in the dataset.
    DBACluster.AntHill.Clusters
    Management class for DBACluster.AntHill.Clusters.
    DBACluster.AntHill.Clusters.ClusterNumGenerator
    The task of the ClusterNumGenerator is to provide ID numbers for new clusters, so that each cluster has an unique ID.
    DBACluster.AntHill.InstancePlaceholder
    Placeholder for a Instance object.
    DBACluster.AntHill.InstancePlaceholderNeighborTag
    Class for storing a neighborhood relation.
    DBACluster.AntHill.InstancePlaceholders
    Management class for DBACluster.AntHill.InstancePlaceholder objects.
    InstancesOnAntGrid
    This class is an extension for the Instances class.
    LFCluster.Ant
    Class of the ants running on the grid.
    LFCluster.Ant.PositionMemory
    This is a memory for ants where they can remember positions.
    LFCluster.Ant.PositionMemory.PositionMemoryEntry 
    LFCluster.Coordinate
    Coordinate in an imaginary two-dimensional coordinate system.
    LFCluster.Grid
    The grid object where the LFCluster.GridInstance objects are placed and the ants run to cluster these GridInstance objects.
    LFCluster.GridInstance
    Placeholder for a Instance object that can be managed on the grid.
